top_comment.text:
In Iran lives 30,00+ Jews. Iran is Judaism's second most important nation.
1. Cyrus the Great freed the Jews from Babylon. 
2. Queen Esther was married to Persian King, Xerxes (yes the same one in 
300, stupid Hollywood bullshit)
3. Prophet Daniel, Prophet Haggai and Prophet Zechariah were all Persian 
Jews.
Did you know 20% of residents on Beverly Hills are Persian Jews? 
Did you know the top 10 Iranian billionaires are mainly Persian Jews?
Around the world there are roughly 500 000 Persian Jews.
The most prominent female pop star in Israel is a Persian Jew.
A former President of Israel was a Persian Jew.
Yet those sons of bitches clapped against Iran.﻿
top_comment.author: Araz Karadeniz

comments.text:
+Rabbi Avi Shekelstein Yes there are. They are beautiful, the designs are 
spectacular. A blend of Persian and Jewish culture.
comments.author: Araz Karadeniz

comments.text: There are also 200 synagogues in Iran.
comments.author: Rabbi Avi Shekelstein

top_comment.text: Wipe out the Jew's that's all I got to say...﻿
top_comment.author: Prophet Muhammad

comments.text: Youtube's comment system is really funny....
